sentences.english: Cina's richest man is set to join the ruling Communist Party's Central Committee, media reports say.
sentences.chinese: 据媒体报道，中国首富将要进入中共中央委员会。

sentences.english: After the New Chinese Government was founded, three important conferences were held by the Central Committee of CPC.
sentences.chinese: 新中国成立后，中共中央在庐山召开了三次重要会议。

sentences.english: In 1973 the CPC Central Committee decided to expel the party.
sentences.chinese: 一九七三年中共中央决定开除其党籍。

sentences.english: Messrs. Jiang and Xiao currently sit on the party's Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 姜建清与肖钢目前均是中共中央候补委员。

sentences.english: The central committee of the communist party in 1995 to today "about hastening scientific and technological progress of decision".
sentences.chinese: 中共中央作出《关于加速科学技术进步的决定》。

sentences.english: June 5, 1986, minority and remote areas of the CPC Central Committee held in the work of the whole party forum .
sentences.chinese: 中共中央召开少数民族和边远地区整党工作座谈会。
